internal-server-error.title: Something bad just happened...
internal-server-error.description: Our servers could not handle your request. Don't worry, our development team was already notified. Try refreshing the page.

not-found.title: You have found a secret place.
not-found.description: Unfortunately, this is only a 404 page. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL.
not-found.go-home: Take me back to home page
